description: Gets revisions of the specified workflow. Only the last 100 revisions are stored. If the workflow has been deprecated, this action will return revisions that occurred before the deprecation. This action won't work for workflows that have been deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the workflow. The ID should be in the following format. urn:tdm:REGION/ACCOUNT ID/default:workflow:WORKFLOWNAME.

nested_items.name: summaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that provide summary data about each revision.

nested_items.name: revisionNumber
nested_items.description: The revision number of the workflow.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date when the workflow was created.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The string to specify as nextToken when you request the next page of results.
